tossup_question: -  23)  – 	A line of brown semicircles on a weather map indicates:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)  warm front
X) A cold front
Y) A dry line
Z) Smog
bonus_question: -   –  What structural modification did the United States introduce to enable atmospheric pollutants such as nitrogen and sulfur oxides to be dispersed at higher altitudes?
